title: Create step-welcome component for Steps 0-2
description:
Create the welcome steps component for FO-03.

File to create: app/fo-03/components/step-welcome.tsx

Step 0 - Welcome:
- Headline: The way you speak to yourself becomes the way you live!
- Text: Today is the day you get unique, personal affirmations.
- CTA: Continue

Step 1 - First name:
- Headline: What should we call you?
- Text input with placeholder: Type your first name
- CTA: Continue (disabled until name entered)

Step 2 - Personalized welcome:
- Text: Welcome, {name}! Let us get to know you so you can get your own unique and personal affirmations.
- CTA: Start

Reference app/fo-02/components/step-welcome.tsx for component pattern.
acceptance_criteria: npm run build succeeds; grep -l 'StepWelcome' app/fo-03/components/step-welcome.tsx returns the file
closed_reason: Created step-welcome.tsx with 3 step screens: Step 0 (welcome headline + description), Step 1 (name input with disabled button until filled), Step 2 (personalized greeting with Start CTA). Updated fo-experience.tsx to import and render StepWelcome for steps 0-2.
